text:
Hi there!

It's a little hacky, but one thing you could do to migrate a blog from one portal to another is...

1. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/export-your-content-and-data|Export all blog post content from portal A as a CSV>
2. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/blog/import-your-blog-into-HubSpot-as-a-csv-file|Import those posts into portal B using our "import using CSV" functionality>
